name: AI Tanks
description:
AI police robots have gone haywire in your town, and it's up to you to defeat them all! 

This game is a prototype made by Lambhunter0 (George Theophanous) and poofyOwl (Stavroula Theophanous), a rag-tag brother-sister team of wet behind the ears game devs with a strong background in software.

Most of the art was made by us. Audio and soem art assets downloaded from opengameart
